Sedative, Hypnotic, or Anxiolytic Use Disorder 263
Specify if:
In early remission: After full criteria for sedative, hypnotic, or
anxiolytic use disorder were previously met, none of the criteria
for sedative, hypnotic, or anxiolytic use disorder have been met
for at least 3 months but for less than 12 months (with the excep-
tion that Criterion A4, “Craving, or a strong desire or urge to use
the sedative, hypnotic, or anxiolytic,” may be met).
In sustained remission: After full criteria for sedative, hypnotic,
or anxiolytic use disorder were previously met, none of the crite-
ria for sedative, hypnotic, or anxiolytic use disorder have been
met at any time during a period of 12 months or longer (with the
exception that Criterion A4, “Craving, or a strong desire or urge
to use the sedative, hypnotic, or anxiolytic,” may be met).
Specify if:
In a controlled environment: This additional specifier is used if
the individual is in an environment where access to sedatives,
hypnotics, or anxiolytics is restricted.
